Event: RIP Robin from the Washington Park library
Post: "I'm still in shock after hearing about Robin's passing. She was always so full of life and energy whenever I saw her at the Washington Park library. It's hard to believe that she's gone, and it makes me realize how fragile life can be. Maybe I should have been kinder to her when she was alive, or maybe I could have done something to help her when she was struggling. It's a harsh reminder that we never know what someone else might be going through, and it's up to us to be there for each other. Rest in peace, Robin."
